H0.text: April 5, 1614 saw early American settler and tobacco exporter John Rolfe marry who. Pocahontas

H1.text: April 5, 1614 saw early American settler and tobacco exporter John Rolfe marry who. Lady Temperance Yeardley

H2.text: April 5, 1614 saw early American settler and tobacco exporter John Rolfe marry who. Anne Burras

H3.text: April 5, 1614 saw early American settler and tobacco exporter John Rolfe marry who. Matoika

A4.text: Rolfe married Pocahontas, daughter of the local Native American leader Powhatan, on 5 April 1614.
